content: 1 |by t h r ea d y a r ns christmas gnomes collection © instagram https //www instagram com/thread yarns/ blog https //threadyarns blogspot com/ ravelry shop https //www ravelry com/people/threadyarns this pattern is an intellectual property of thread yarns please do no re-distribute or make profit from it any action that violate the author s rights is consider robbery 2 |by t h r ea d y a r ns santa gnome materials yarn i used milk cotton 4ply hook 3 mm the item is 6 inches tall -> for the final result to be well-shaped i recommend you to used a hook that 0 5 or 1 size smaller than what your yarn suggested fiber fill yarn needle -plastic canvas optional if you want the gnome to stand on its own abbreviation st stitch single_crochet single_crochet how to change yarn color slip_stitch slip_stitch blo back loop only only crochet to the back loop of the sts 3 |by t h r ea d y a r ns increase increase = make 2 single_crochet from 1 st decrease decrease = make 1 single_crochet from 2 sts note - stuffing as you go only stuff slightly the arms do not over stuff the arms head &body working in spiral using red yarn round 1 magic_ring with 6 single_crochet round 2 6 increase 12 sts round 3 single_crochet in the next st increase x 6 18 sts round 4 2sc in the next 2 st increase x 6 24 sts round 5 3 single_crochet in the next 3 st increase x 6 30 sts round 6 4sc in the next 4st increase x 6 36 sts round 7 5sc in the next 4st increase x 6 42 sts round 8 blo 42 single_crochet round 9-13 42 single_crochet chang to black round 14-15 42 single_crochet chang to red yarn round 16-21 42 single_crochet round 22 5sc in the next 4st decrease x 6 30 sts round 23 4sc in the next 4st decrease x 6 30 sts round 24 3 single_crochet in the next 3st decrease x 6 24 sts round 25 2 single_crochet in the next 2 st decrease x 6 18 sts round 26 single_crochet in the next st decrease x 6 12 sts round 27 6 decrease 6 sts fasten_off arms make 2 working in spiral start with skin color yarn round 1 magic_ring with 6 single_crochet round 2 single_crochet in the next st increase x 3 9 sts round 3 9sc change to red round 4-12 9sc round 13 single_crochet in the next st decrease x 3 6 sts 4 |by t h r ea d y a r ns round 14 fold in half 2 single_crochet fasten_off leave yarn tail to sew to the body nose working in spiral start with skin color yarn round 1 magic_ring with 6 single_crochet round 2 6 increase 12 sts round 3 3 single_crochet in the next st increase x 3- 15 sts round 4 15 single_crochet invisible fasten_off long
